abilities.name: Strength
abilities.description: Measures your character's physical power and determines how much your character can carry.

abilities.name: Dexterity
abilities.description: Measures agility, reflexes, and balance. It affects Armor Class, Reflex saves, and ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Constitution
abilities.description: Represents your character's health and stamina. It affects hit points and Fortitude saves.

abilities.name: Intelligence
abilities.description: Measures reasoning ability, memory, and analytical thinking. It determines additional languages and skills.

abilities.name: Wisdom
abilities.description: Reflects how attuned you are to the world around you and represents perceptiveness and intuition.

abilities.name: Charisma
abilities.description: Measures your character's personal magnetism, persuasiveness, and force of personality.
